events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's complaint about receiving an incorrect item has been classified under refund requests.
Support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the refund case opened by the customer.
Hello! I'm Julia from support. I'm sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so I can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 4578921. I've attached a picture showing the wrong product I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund which should be processed within 5 business days. We'll also send you a prepaid return label.
I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions. Looking forward to receiving the return label soon.
The refund process has been completed and the return label sent via email. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
We are just checking to confirm that you received the refund and the return label without any issues. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Since we have not received any further issues from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support team.
